#### Wednesday

Before class:

- Review the course [syllabus](syllabus.qmd)
- Familiarize yourself with Moodle and the course website
- Complete the [Welcome survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe7RhOK_7B3XgKNfJ94gdRjftEZjqOtHotYeqF1__B-c_uhIQ/viewform?usp=sf_link)
- Listen to the first episode of the [Sold a Story podcast](https://features.apmreports.org/sold-a-story/) (Episode 1: The Problem) (~30 minutes). This will provide some useful context for what we explore on our first day together.

#### Friday

Before class:

- Complete the [Welcome survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe7RhOK_7B3XgKNfJ94gdRjftEZjqOtHotYeqF1__B-c_uhIQ/viewform?usp=sf_link) (if you havenâ€™t already!)
- Complete today's [checkpoint](https://moodle.macalester.edu/mod/quiz/view.php?id=130247) on Moodle
    - Do either the readings or videos for the Day 2 Activity (see Moodle checkpoint description for links to the readings and videos)
    - Due 30 minutes before class today (11:30am on 9/6)
